text: Myristica perlaevis is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is a tree endemic to Maluku in Indonesia. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Myristica perlaevis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
